page.title: 08CHILDREN VIEWS
page.content: {THE CHURCH OF SAINT MICHAEL}ON TUESDAY MORNING CLASS THREE WENT TO THE CHURCH AND I THOUGHT THAT IT WAS VERY GOOD THERE BECAUSE I LEARNT ALOT MORE ABOUT THE CHURCH THAN I KNEW BEFORE I WENT THERE.IT WAS BUILT IN 1430.I NEVER KNEW THAT THERE WERE ANY GRAVES IN THE CHURCH.THERE IS AN EAGLE WAS MADE OF OAK AND SO WERE THE SEATS. THERE WAS AN OWL AND I THOUGHT THAT IT WAS FOR FRIGHENING THE MICE AWAY BUT IT WAS TO FRIGHEN AWAY A PLAGUE OF BATS THAT THEY DID HAVE.I WAS VERY SURPRISED ABOUT THAT.I ENJOYED IT VERY MUCH. { {THE RIVER TEIGN-WHAT IT MEANS TO ME IT IS A NICE PLACE TO SWIM BUT COLD. I DONT THINK THAT ANY FAMOUS PAINTER HAS EVER PAINTED THE RIVER TEIGN.WE USUALLY GO THERE WHICH IS GREAT FUN. ONCE WE FOUND AN OLD SMASHED CANOE ON THE ROCKS.WE HAVE A RAFT MADE OUT OF PLASTIC CONTAINERS WHICH WE SHARE WITH
